title: Advanced Neurotropic Focus Aid Supplement - Enhance Brain Function and Clarity with DMAE, Bacopa, and GABA - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Unlock your brain's potential with the Advanced Neurotropic Focus Aid Supplement by Success Chemistry. This meticulously formulated supplement combines powerful ingredients like DMAE, Bacopa Monnieri, and GABA, designed to boost cognitive function, enhance focus, and support overall mental clarity.
Key Benefits:
  • Cognitive Enhancement: Supports memory retention and learning capabilities, helping you stay sharp and attentive throughout the day.
  • Stress Reduction: GABA promotes relaxation and helps alleviate anxiety, creating a sense of calm and focus when you need it most.
  • Energy Boost: Ingredients work synergistically to improve energy levels and mental stamina, making it easier to tackle daily challenges.
Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules, providing a convenient one-month supply. Embrace a sharper mind and improved cognitive health with Success Chemistry’s Advanced Neurotropic Focus Aid. Ideal for students, professionals, or anyone looking to enhance their mental performance naturally!
Incorporate Success Chemistry's Advanced Neurotropic Focus Aid Supplement into your daily routine to boost brain function, enhance focus, and support overall cognitive health. Experience the comprehensive benefits of our advanced neurotropic formula and unlock your cognitive potential naturally.
shortDescriptionHtml: Enhance brain function and focus with Success Chemistry's Advanced Neurotropic Focus Aid Supplement. Our formula with DMAE, Bacopa, and GABA supports cognitive health, mental clarity, and overall well-being. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
DMAE (Dimethylaminoethanol) 300 mg †
Bacopa Monnieri Extract (whole plant) (20% Bacosides) 250 mg †
GABA (Gamma Aminobutyric Acid) 200 mg †
L-Glutamine 150 mg †
Phosphatidylserine Complex 100 mg †
Alpha Lipoic Acid 50 mg †
Huperzine-A 10 mcg †

† Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Vegetable Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate (vegetable source), Silicon Dioxide.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
